artist: Artist: Shawn Granton; Publisher: TFR Industries, Portland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of backpacking robot-figure and text printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 12 pp.
title: A Ten Foot Rule "On the Road" Special: Treatment Bound
